catalog_info.title: Materials in Ancient Societies:Ceramics
catalog_info.notes: Meets at M.I.T. Open to senior undergraduates with permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: Seminars and labs provide in-depth study of the technologies ancient societies used to produce objects from ceramic materials, including clays and mortars. Seminars cover basic ceramic materials science and engineering and relate materials selection and processing to environment, exchange, political power, and cultural valuesThis seminar-laboratory subject provides in-depth study of the technologies of ancient societies.
